inquiryPage.title: Inquiries and Suggestions
inquiryPage.reLoginErrorWithWithdrawalGuide:
This account has already been deactivated.
If you wish to re-register, please click this link to contact us via email.

notificationPage.allNotificationsChecked: You've already checked all the notifications.

settingPage.title: Setting
settingPage.howToBlock: You can block accounts through the detail function in posts or comments.
settingPage.withdrawalGuide: Your request for account deletion will be processed after confirmation by the Ara administrator, and it may take up to 24 hours.
settingPage.userBlockingGuide: User blocking can be done through the 'More' option in posts. You can change it up to 10 times per day.
settingPage.errorSavingSettings: An error occurred, and the settings could not be applied. Please try again.
settingPage.myReplies: Comments and Nested Comments of My Posts
settingPage.hotInfo: We deliver trending announcements and posts every day at 8:30 a.m.
settingPage.emailNotAvailable: If the default mail application cannot be opened, please contact ara@sparcs.org.

postViewPage.launchInBrowserNotAvailable: The URL could not be opened by browser.
postViewPage.noSelfVotingInfo: You cannot vote for your post or comment!
postViewPage.blockedUsersPost: This post was written by blocked user.
postViewPage.blockedUsersComment: This comment was written by blocked user.
postViewPage.reportedPost: This post is hidden due to the accumulation of reports.
postViewPage.reportedComment: This comment is hidden due to the accumulation of reports.
postViewPage.accessDeniedPost: Access for this post is denied.
postViewPage.blockedUsersContentNotice: You can change blocked users in your Setting page.
postViewPage.adultContentNotice: You can change the setting in your Setting page to show this kinds of post.
postViewPage.socialContentNotice: You can change the setting in your Setting page to show this kinds of post.

postViewUtils.letUsKnowPostReportReason: Let us know your reason for reporting the post.
postViewUtils.letUsKnowCommentReportReason: Let us know your reason for reporting the comment.
